entry.title: Saturday: Periods of drizzle or rain. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle this morning. Periods of rain mixed with ice pellets beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this morning. High plus 5. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with ice pellets changing to snow mixed with ice pellets this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023
